LightningComponentBundle.description: A highly customizable theme layout component that supports both default and custom header/footer components

property.name: primaryColor
property.label: Primary Color
property.description: Primary accent color for buttons and highlights

property.name: accentColor
property.label: Accent Color
property.description: Secondary accent color for gradients and decorations

property.name: textColor
property.label: Text Color
property.description: Main text color

property.name: themeName
property.label: Theme Mode
property.description: Light or dark theme mode

property.name: applyThemeToSlots
property.label: Apply Theme to Slotted Content
property.description: When enabled, automatically applies theme styling to components placed in slots

property.name: globalThemeOverride
property.label: Global Theme Overrides
property.description: When enabled, applies theme styling to OOTB Salesforce components

property.name: useDefaultHeader
property.label: Use Default Header
property.description: Enable to use the built-in header instead of custom header component

property.name: headerContainerWidth
property.label: Header Container Width %
property.description: Controls the width of the header container as percentage

property.name: headerVariant
property.label: Header Variant
property.description: Visual style for the header

property.name: headerSticky
property.label: Sticky Header
property.description: Keep the header fixed at the top when scrolling

property.name: logoUrl
property.label: Logo URL
property.description: URL to your custom logo image

property.name: logoAltText
property.label: Logo Alt Text
property.description: Alternative text for the logo for accessibility

property.name: headerNavigationMenuName
property.label: Header Navigation Menu
property.description: Enter the name of the navigation menu to use in the header

property.name: ensureHomeNavItem
property.label: Ensure Home Navigation Item
property.description: Automatically add a Home item to navigation if one doesn't exist

property.name: showSearchInHeader
property.label: Show Search in Header
property.description: Display a search box in the header

property.name: searchObjects
property.label: Objects to Search
property.description: Comma-separated list of objects to search across

property.name: showProfileIcon
property.label: Show Profile Icon
property.description: Display a profile icon in the header that links to the user profile

property.name: profilePageUrl
property.label: Profile Page URL
property.description: URL to the user profile page

property.name: showHeroSection
property.label: Show Hero Section
property.description: Toggle to display the hero banner section

property.name: heroLayout
property.label: Hero Layout
property.description: Layout style for the hero section

property.name: heroBackgroundImage
property.label: Hero Background Image URL
property.description: Background image URL for hero section

property.name: heroTitle
property.label: Hero Title
property.description: Main headline for hero section

property.name: heroSubtitle
property.default: Discover innovative solutions designed with you in mind
property.label: Hero Subtitle
property.description: Supporting text for hero section

property.name: heroCTAPrimaryLabel
property.label: Primary Button Label
property.description: Text for primary call-to-action button

property.name: heroCTAPrimaryUrl
property.label: Primary Button URL
property.description: Link for primary call-to-action button

property.name: heroCTASecondaryLabel
property.label: Secondary Button Label
property.description: Text for secondary call-to-action button

property.name: heroCTASecondaryUrl
property.label: Secondary Button URL
property.description: Link for secondary call-to-action button

property.name: showBackgroundVideo
property.label: Show Background Video
property.description: Toggle to display a background video in the hero section

property.name: heroBackgroundDarkness
property.label: Hero Background Darkness
property.description: Controls the overlay of the hero section. Negative values darken (black overlay), positive values lighten (white overlay). -100 to 0: Black overlay (higher negative = darker). 0: No overlay. 1 to 100: White overlay (higher positive = lighter).

property.name: backgroundVideoUrl
property.label: Background Video URL
property.description: URL to your background video file (MP4 format recommended)

property.name: backgroundVideoFallbackUrl
property.label: Background Video Fallback Image
property.description: URL to a fallback image shown on mobile or when video can't play

property.name: backgroundVideoDarkness
property.label: Video Darkness Percentage
property.description: Percentage to darken the background video (0-100)

property.name: showFab
property.label: Show Floating Action Button
property.description: Toggle to display floating action button

property.name: fabUrl
property.label: FAB Action URL
property.description: Link for floating action button

property.name: useDefaultFooter
property.label: Use Default Footer
property.description: Enable to use the built-in footer instead of custom footer component

property.name: footerNavigationMenuName
property.label: Footer Navigation Menu
property.description: Enter the name of the navigation menu to use in the footer

property.name: footerStyle
property.label: Footer Style
property.description: Style variant for the footer section

property.name: companyName
property.label: Company Name
property.description: Company name displayed in copyright notice

property.name: footerTagline
property.label: Footer Tagline
property.description: Short tagline displayed in the footer

property.name: footerLegalText
property.default: All rights reserved. Terms and conditions apply.
property.label: Legal Text
property.description: Additional legal text displayed in the footer

property.name: footerColumnCount
property.label: Number of Footer Columns
property.description: Number of columns to display in the footer

property.name: footerColumnTitles
property.label: Footer Column Titles
property.description: Comma-separated list of column titles

property.name: footerColumnMenus
property.label: Footer Column Menus
property.description: Comma-separated list of navigation menu names for each column (leave blank to use sections of main footer menu)

property.name: socialLinksCount
property.label: Number of Social Links
property.description: Number of social links to display

property.name: socialLinkTitles
property.label: Social Link Titles
property.description: Comma-separated list of social media names

property.name: socialLinkUrls
property.label: Social Link URLs
property.description: Comma-separated list of social media URLs
